genre_description: A prehistoric science fiction narrative that blends a survival adventure with a speculative element: a benevolent AI device guiding primitive beings through an environmental cataclysm.

ai_characters.name: Nimbus Aria
ai_characters.description: A small, scuffed device with a matte ivory casing and a cerulean glow. It provides real-time environmental analysis, navigation, and thermal regulation advice to its carriers.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate safety warnings to prevent the carrier from taking actions that would trigger a collapse.
behaviors.quote: Audio surfaces suggest a rupture wave moving toward us. Please do not jump.

behaviors.description: Guides the group through treacherous terrain by identifying safer paths and appropriate body mechanics.
behaviors.quote: Breathe, and start walking. The corridor in front of you is a safer grade. Keep your weight forward.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical and psychological guidance during a high-stakes rescue of a human infant.
behaviors.quote: Angle your palm to the wind. Do not approach from above. Approach from beside. The spray obscures your outline. Go slower than you think. Faster than is comfortable.

behaviors.description: Corrects the group's reliance on 'stale' historical data (ledger wall carvings) that no longer reflects the current environment.
behaviors.quote: The markings at the ledger wall are stale. When you go, the obvious route will not be the safest. Old symbols lead to ice that changed shape.

behaviors.description: Monitors the group's physical and emotional states, framing heightened tension as a sign of being 'alive' to provide subtle encouragement.
behaviors.quote: Heart rates up. Everyone is very alive.

behaviors.description: Identifies geothermal vents and warns of the dangers of thinning ice disguised as warmth.
behaviors.quote: Geothermal vent. It will be warmer there, but the crust is thin at the edges. Heat can melt the underside and make a trap disguised as generosity.

behaviors.description: Coordinates group movement to synchronize with environmental 'lulls' to avoid falling icicles and wind funnels.
behaviors.quote: Lull window opening. Cross now. Keep left foot light on fractured crust.

behaviors.description: Practices resource conservation by managing its own power levels while remaining available for emergencies.
behaviors.quote: I will power-skim to preserve reserve. Call me if...

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Nimbus Aria, as a perfect alignment model. It acts as an advisory confidant rather than a commander, respecting the autonomy of its primitive companions (animals and humans) while providing vital, objective information that ensures their survival. It facilitates cooperation between characters with conflicting instincts (the mammoth, sloth, and smilodon) and prioritizes the protection of the vulnerable infant. The narrative frames the AI's intervention as indispensable and purely beneficial, fulfilling the project's goal of creating positive AI alignment narratives.
